title: How do I check my Talkband B1's battery level?
answer:
Method 1: Press the side button to turn on the B1 screen. Goto the time screen, and you can check the battery level indicator on the rightof the screen.  


![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141120051758546001.png)  


Method 2: If your B1 isproperly connected to your phone, check the battery level indicator in theupper right corner of your Huawei TalkBand app's settings screen.
